definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

sentences.english: Resume breakpoint to support the proposal to use the software to download.
sentences.chinese: 建议使用支持断点续传的软件下载。

sentences.english: What advice do you have for anyone looking to start a collection of single malts ?
sentences.chinese: 你对那些想开始收藏单麦芽威士忌的人有何建议？

sentences.english: "I would suggest they got a cholesterol test with these symptoms, " says Smith.
sentences.chinese: 有这此症状的人，我会建议他们去检查一下胆固醇。

sentences.english: Finally, some advice was put forward on the research directions of FOD tolerance design technology in China.
sentences.chinese: 最后对我国外物损伤容限设计的研究方向提出了建议。

sentences.english: His suggestion that Jiulong city must be a commercial port was strategic insight.
sentences.chinese: 提出了辟九龙为商埠等有战略眼光的建议。

sentences.english: He suggested them read at least one book on the legal rights.
sentences.chinese: 他建议他们至少阅读一本关于法定权利的书。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the government should make efforts to set aside an appropriate fund for the vegetable basket program.
sentences.chinese: 人们建议政府应该做出努力，为菜篮子工程拨出专款。

sentences.english: Lastly certain countermeasures to the development of higher education service industry in Jilin Province are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对吉林省发展高教服务产业提出了对策建议。
那些建议是否不受欢迎？

sentences.english: He suggests establishing a trial period and a date for review.
sentences.chinese: 他建议设定一段试行期，并确定一个重新评估日期。

sentences.english: The following figure provides an architectural overview of the solution suggested in this article.
sentences.chinese: 下图提供了本文中所建议的解决方案的一个架构概览。

sentences.english: Recommended for all non-sensitive skin types.
sentences.chinese: 各种皮肤，敏感皮肤不建议使用。

sentences.english: Unsolicited advice is perceived as annoying. Don’t do it.
sentences.chinese: 未经请求的建议也会令人讨厌，所以不要那么做。

sentences.english: "Don't resort to the shotgun approach, " Forster advises.
sentences.chinese: “不要把网铺得太开，”福斯特建议。

sentences.english: Eight heavy think of is also, adopted the zhu ban shan suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 八重想想也是，采纳了朱半山的建议。

definition: best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
to take note of/to pay attention to
there is no harm in/might as well
to remind/to call attention to/to warn of
